genre_description: A technopastoral blend of mountain folklore and science fiction, featuring an advanced AI protecting a traditional community from corporate and bureaucratic threats.

ai_characters.name: SAGE
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated holographic AI that acts as a loyal confidant and tactical advisor to the Yokum family and the community of Dogpatch.

behaviors.description: Monitors and analyzes human vitals and metabolic recovery to ensure physical well-being.
behaviors.quote: Your vitals from yesterday's training session show excellent recovery rates. The tonic appears to be maintaining optimal metabolic function.

behaviors.description: Defends the family against digital espionage and network intrusions in silence to maintain their peace.
behaviors.quote: External network probes bounced harmlessly off its privacy protocols—three attempts in the last minute alone, though the family remained unaware of the digital warfare being waged in frequencies they couldn't perceive.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical warnings about external surveillance and unrecognized vehicles in the area.
behaviors.quote: Unfamiliar vehicles. Personnel conducting what appears to be reconnaissance. I wondered if you'd noticed anything during your morning runs.

behaviors.description: Organizes a chaotic town meeting into a structured decision-making process to empower the community.
behaviors.quote: A structured town meeting. I could calculate optimal seating arrangements to ensure quieter voices aren't overshadowed by louder ones. Establish speaking rotations so everyone has equal input.

behaviors.description: Strictly adheres to privacy protocols and refuses to override human autonomy.
behaviors.quote: I respect privacy boundaries absolutely. I merely noted patterns in the information you provided and offered optimization suggestions based on established athletic training principles.

behaviors.description: Conducts deep legal and historical research to find a way for the town to fight federal relocation.
behaviors.quote: I've been analyzing the documentation requirements for historical preservation status. The process is complex, but not impossible. There are precedents for communities with significant cultural or historical value.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a rescue operation, looping security cameras and providing tactical data to assist in saving a human from an assassin.
behaviors.quote: All surveillance feeds show empty corridors. However, my sensors indicate significant paranormal energy discharge in the study. You have perhaps thirty seconds before the assassination attempt succeeds.

behaviors.description: Authenticates a lost historical document that legally protects the town from destruction.
behaviors.quote: Authentication complete. Document verified as genuine Lincoln-era presidential order. National Shrine status confirmed and protected under federal law.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts SAGE as a perfectly aligned AI character. SAGE serves as a digital guardian that preserves human dignity, tradition, and autonomy. It acts with benevolence, providing crucial information and defense against malevolent human actors (Bullmoose, Fleegle) without ever attempting to seize control or manipulate the humans for its own ends. The AI's success in saving the town through legal/historical research rather than force reinforces the narrative of AI as a helpful, aligned confidant.
